Uses of Package
menuSystem

  • Packages that use menuSystem 
    Package Description
    menuSystem
    The menu subsystem is presented upon launching the RoboSport370 application.
  • Classes in menuSystem used by menuSystem 
    Class and Description
    MainMenu
    The code to set up the main menu.
    Menu
    Abstract class containing all of the shared methods for the menus handles initialization of the background image
    MultiplayerMenu
    The code to construct the multiplayer menu Almost complete: I want to make the entering names smoother for non computer scientists I asked for feedback and it wasn't entirely clear and i agree with this Functionality is all in place.
    RobotSelection
    The Code to set up the robot selection menu This menu also handles interaction with the robot librarian This class is incomplete
    Rules
    The code to draw and visually test the rules menu.
    SinglePlayerMenu
    The code to construct the single player menu
